mapper.select: select sum(IFNULL(SRC_AMOUNT,0)) addSum from ACCOUNT_BALANCE_LOG t inner join ACCOUNT_BALANCE t2 on t.ACCOUNT_BALANCE_ID=t2.ACCOUNT_BALANCE_ID inner join ACCOUNT t3 on t2.acct_id=t3.acct_id where t.STATUS_CD='1000' and t2.STATUS_CD='1000' AND t2.EFF_DATE<=SYSDATE() AND t2.EXP_DATE>=SYSDATE() and t3.ACCT_ID=#{req.acctId}

select sum(IFNULL(PAYOUT_AMOUNT,0)) reduceSum from ACCOUNT_BALANCE_LOG t inner join ACCOUNT_BALANCE t2 on t.ACCOUNT_BALANCE_ID=t2.ACCOUNT_BALANCE_ID inner join ACCOUNT t3 on t2.acct_id=t3.acct_id where t.STATUS_CD='1000' and t2.STATUS_CD='1000' AND t2.EFF_DATE<=SYSDATE() AND t2.EXP_DATE>=SYSDATE() and t3.ACCT_ID=#{req.acctId}
